hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #Granny's Potion Shop#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Minuet of Forest#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Strength Upgrade#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that crouch stabs mimic the effects of your last attack.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Impa's House#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Scale#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #2# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Bunny Hood#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Weird Egg#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial First Right Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #a Forest Temple Compass#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Minuet of Forest#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Strength Upgrade#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: Dodongo's Cavern is much easier and faster to clear as Adult.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Scale#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #an Ocarina#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to the #Goron Ruby#.

SFM (Saria).text: Did you know that you can tune a piano but you can't tune a fish?

ToT (Left).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Map of the Ice Cavern#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #2# major items.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Din's Fire#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Lakeside Laboratory#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
